SELECT B.*, IFNULL (A.cnt, 0) cnt, IFNULL (C.option1, D.option1) option1, IFNULL (C.option2, D.option2) option2, IFNULL (C.barcode, D.barcode) barcode FROM ( SELECT prodCd, COUNT(*) cnt FROM tblBom WHERE flagYN = 'Y' GROUP BY prodCd ) A RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM viewProdAll WHERE bomType = "prod" ) B ON B.prodCd = A.prodCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblProduct ) C ON C.prodCd = B.prodCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblResource ) D ON D.resrcCd = B.prodCd
WHERE B.prodNm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{findProdNm}, '%')
